喆字的基本解释

喆
zhé
同“哲”，多用于人名。

喆字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhé］
［《廣韻》陟列切，入薛，知。］
亦作“啠1”。亦作“喆1”。“嚞1”的今字。亦作“埑1”。
(1)明智；有智慧。
(2)贤明的人；有智慧的人。
(3)知道；了解。
(4)表尊称。参见“哲兄”、“哲嗣”。
(5)哲学的简称。
(6)通“折”。制裁；决断。参见“哲人”、“哲獄”。

喆字的康熙字典解释

【丑集上】【口字部】　喆； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页197第26
【玉篇】同哲。【前漢·敘傳】聖喆之治。【後漢·皇后紀】詳求淑喆。　又【說文長箋】喆，明也，故明日爲喆朝。俗譌作詰。【正字通】此說迂泥。

喆字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
喆字的起名意思

：指圣喆之治。通哲。指有智慧，聪明的人。

Zhe
Basic explanation of words
Zhe
zhé
Same as "Zhe", mostly used for names.
Zhe
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhé］
["Guang Yun" Zhi column cut, enter Xue, know. ]
Also known as "啠1". Also known as "Zhe 1". The present word for "嚞1". Also known as "埑1".
(1) Be wise; be wise.
(2) A wise person; a wise person.
(3) Know; understand.
(4) Honorary title. See "Zhe Brother", "Zhe Si".
(5) Abbreviation for philosophy.
(6) Through "folding". Sanctions; decisive. See "philosopher", "philosopher prison".
Zhe
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 1] [Words Department] 　喆; Kangxi strokes: 12; Page number: page 197 26
[Jade articles] Tongzhe. [Previous Han·Xu Biography] The rule of Saint Zhe. [Later Han·Queens] Please ask Shuzhe for details.　[Said Wen Changjian] Zhe, Ming Ye, so tomorrow is Zhe Dynasty. The vulgar 譌 makes a cross-examination. [Zhengzitong] This is a roundabout way.
